CODE OF CONDUCT

In order to have a Guild that reflects Loyalty, Compassion, Support and Focus certain rules and procedures need to be set in place to ensure the Guild will prosper. Celestial fury would like to be the type of Guild that offers its members unconditional support and in order to do this we have devised a simple set of rules for all members to follow. Whilst these rules a merely set up as a guide, any ignorance of these rules will not be tolerated and each member will be given 3 warnings further incidents will result in dismissal.

     *When playing your Character/Characters your Guild Name MUST be showing at all times. If you wish to play anonymously you may do so by using the /role-play command.

     *Ill behavior or Ill-treatment of other players is NOT permitted. This would include but is not limited to: any form of 'Ninja Looting', 'Grief' playing (going out of your way to cause other players grief by immature and irrational behavior and/or abuse) Abusive language or vulgarity of any form, Ksing (Kill Stealing) and harassment.

     *Support and Loyalty are two things that are of utmost importance to our Guild. If and when a Guild-mate is ever in trouble or in need it is your responsibility to do all you can to assist, whenever feasible. Loyalty goes without question. If you are a member of this guild, you are required to show loyalty to the guild and its members.

    *No selling over guild talk. If you have an item you would like to get rid of, pass it down to someone who can use it. Otherwise go to EC and sell it.

     *Our reputation is something we also need to uphold. Please keep this in mind when you are carrying out your day to day adventuring in Norrath.

     *Always remember - to watch your manners.

MISUSE OR ABUSE

First offense - Warning #1 - These are assigned to the individuals over-all account and thus applicable to any character the user plays.

Second Offense - Warning #2 - These are also assigned to the individuals account and apply to all characters played. After a second warning is issued, the player will not be allowed to guild additional alts for 1 month.

Third Offense - The Character in violation is removed from the guild. Alts are allowed to stay in the guild. After a third warning, the player may not add alts to the guild for 6 months.

Additional Offenses - Removal of other characters and potentially (if all officers are in agreement) complete removal from the guild.

players are expected  to consult guild officers if there is a problem sticking to these rules.

Guests
Guests looting is limited to items that cannot be carried over or on items the Guild leader agrees to let them participate on.


Guild stash and bank
Items can be purchased from the guild stash for second characters or personal use at a later date, only and only if that item has no use for a primary character and could not be traded/sold.

NB1: The Guild leader and his officers always have the final saying on loot participation. There are many items that are restricted.

NB2: the guild leadership to pay for expenses will keep Cash items received during events.

NB3: Guild item received IS noted and is property of the guild. A Celestial Fury member must give back an item if another item of the same type and of greater power is acquired during a guild event.

NB4: Items obtained in a guild event cannot be traded or sold. IF these items aren't needed anymore and wishes to be traded / sold, there must be some talks made to the guild leadership before doing so.

Items that are needed for research spells and vel quest stones are to be donated  to the bank instead of sold to traders.

Magicians, Necro's and Wizards will be donated one piece towards the research spells item depends on what we have in the guild bank. Also one item will be awarded to assist members in the vel. gem quest


 Officers
Officers are selected from the guild amongst people who show great potential, dedication and every officer has some responsibilities to attend to.

The officer roster is dynamic, and any officer, can be decided to be replaced, can ask to be replaced so on.

People can talk to the guild leader if they have interest to become officer and have tasks that need to be done/responsibilities to accomplish.

Guild's pride.

All members of Celestial Fury should be proud of their guild and as such it will be specially asked to avoid being anonymous. Role-play will be an accepted mode to avoid being bugged.

Warnings will be issued to members who are repetitively anonymous.
